CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 8, 1952, pg. 25 reads: "City League Champs - Westinghouse High School's crack basketball team which seems to be gaining a monopoly on the city basketball title won the diadem last week at Pitt Stadium for the third consecutive time. Members of the team which lost just one test against Pittsburgh high schools, are, left to right: John Miller, Charles Hefflin, Rip Nixon, Bill Wilkenson and Coach Willard Fisher.  Bottom row are Pat Wade, Billy Peatross, captain, and Jim Vita. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Westinghouse High School basketball team members, front row from left: Pat Wade, captain Billy Peatross, and Jim Vita; back row: John Miller, Charles Hefflin, Rip Nixon, Bill Wilkenson, and Coach Willard Fisher
